base_description: Tall, cylindrical gray container with a black lid.
part_description: Consists of two parts: a cylindrical gray body and a flat, round black lid on top.
internal_interaction_description: The black lid sits snugly on the open top of the gray cylinder, providing a secure seal. The cylindrical body supports the lid, allowing it to stay in place. The lid can be lifted or removed for access to the interior of the cylinder.
external_interaction_description: This container can hold various items or substances, interacting with users who open the lid for access. It may be placed on flat surfaces, interacting with its environment by occupying space and potentially storing or organizing materials.
